org.csdgn.maru

Class Strings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.csdgn.maru.Strings

  • public class Strings
extends java.lang.Object
    Some basic methods to allow easy escaping and unescaping of strings.
    Author:
    Robert Maupin

      • split

        public static final java.lang.String[] split(java.lang.String src,
                       char delim)
        Preserves null sections. "ab..cd" would produce [ab][][cd] with '.'
        Parameters:
        src - The source string
        delim - The delimiter string to split by
        Returns:
        An array of strings.

      • split

        Preserves null sections. "ab..cd" would produce [ab][][cd] with "."
        Parameters:

        delim - The delimiter string to split by
